channel.title: In need of a designer
channel.description: I'm a horrible designer and I dont really know what color works with another. I've googled and didnt really find anything that caught my eye. Im looking for 2 colors. 1 will be the background and the other will accent it in different parts of the page, any ideas?

item.title: In need of a designer
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

I think the way you should do it is, design it on photoshop, if your not happy with colors you can sit there spending your whole day in experimenting and after you have finished designing the layout and the amazing buttons for your website then you can slice them and put them all together using html + css.

Read full topic

item.title: In need of a designer
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“jal knight, post:7, topic:507360”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=625589.msg4257738#msg4257738 date=1363047555]

Here’s how I do it: first of all, pick what theme the site will have. Dark or light are the two main choices, then work from there. How dark or how light? If you go dark pick a complimenting colour such as gold. If you go light pick a light blue or grey to fit nicely, one of the hardest parts of creating a site is choosing the colour scheme and a lot of people seem to over-think it, follow the KISS principle - Keep it simple, stupid :P.

gz on mod ^.^

lol thanks, Im thinking of a light grey with white. Simple and effective.

You can’t really go wrong with simple, complimenting colours. It doesn’t have to be extravagant. In my opinion and experience I’m actually more drawn to simple, more professional sites rather than flashy and slow loading sites. Just my two cents :P.

Thanks for the congratulations :>

@Lastdivine, please avoid posting spammy images such as those, they just clog the forums up. I’ll let you off this time, consider this a warning.
[/quote]

I think i’ll just load a bunch of flash on it and call it good. Maybe 10 random flash videos should do the trick![/quote]
Hmm… Flash… I’m sure I read about that in a hieroglyph somewhere. Must be something as old as ancient Egypt ;).

Read full topic
